title: A bill to authorize the Secretary of the Interior and the Secretary of Agriculture to make grants to facilitate the establishment of the National Ag Science Center in Stanislaus County, California.
content: National Ag Science Center Act of 2006 - Directs the Secretary of the Interior and the Secretary of Agriculture to provide to the entity known as Ag Science Center, Inc. in Stanislaus County, California, grants to pay not more than a total of 33 of the total costs of establishing the National Ag Science Center.
